name: Patricia Bouley
biography: Patricia Bouley was born in Kansas in 1955. She graduated with a degree in Psychology and Fine Arts at Southern Connecticut State University and studied at L'Academy de la Grand Chaumiere in Paris. She then pursued graduate studies in Decorative Arts. Bouley has worked as an art director, color specialist, and with textiles in New York City. She is now pursuing a full time career as a painter out of her studio in Greenpoint, Brooklyn.
